title: SuperMarioRL
description: A reinforcement learning project using the PPO algorithm to train an AI agent to play Super Mario Bros. on the NES console.

title: PokeGenerator
description: A Keras deep learning project employing variational autoencoders and latent diffusion models to generate novel 128x128 RGB Pok√©mon sprites.

title: DDoS ML Feature Analysis
description: IoT intrusion detection project enhancing detection accuracy of DoS/DDoS attacks through data imbalance correction using SMOTE and machine learning classifiers, achieving an F1-score of 0.999983.

title: CaptionThis
description: A Python-based deep learning tool for generating insightful captions for images. Utilizing the BLIP model and trained using Google's Conceptual Captions dataset.
